Remote Ghost S01

An eerie lo-fi dream loop: muted tones and sleepy pads drift over a brittle snare while reverse Rhodes flicker in the haze. Opens with a tape pop, closes on a hiss swell — ghosted ambience with a quiet, unsettling pulse.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: lo-fi, dream pop, ambient
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 2:15
